attributes.action: The removal of Anna Soubry as Armed Forces Minister
attributes.additional_details: Anna Soubry position is tainted by what she has written to MPs and members of the pubic about the Tom Neathway bullying case. She cast doubt over Cpl Neathway’s story by telling MPs the stories were ‘inaccurate’ and ‘misleading without establishing facts. Her impartiality and suitability to lead the Army’s anti-bullying drive can not be trusted. Members of the public have no confidence in Mrs Soubrys post of leading the Army’s anti-bullying policy and this e- petition calls for her removal!
